actions.message:
```
‚óÜ„Äã | +slap [@user]            Slaps the mentioned user.
‚óÜ„Äã | +hug [@user]             Hugs the mentioned user.
‚óÜ„Äã | +kill [@user]            Kills the mentioned user.
‚óÜ„Äã | +snowball [@user]        Throws snowball at the mentioned user.
‚óÜ„Äã | +emolets [message]       Turn numbers and letters into regional character emojis.
‚óÜ„Äã | +profilepicture [@user]  Posts the profile picture of the mention user.
‚óÜ„Äã | +gennumber [min] [max]   Returns a random number.
‚óÜ„Äã | +cointoss                Returns "Heads" or "Tails".
‚óÜ„Äã | +gold                    Display's the user's gold.   
‚óÜ„Äã | +gamble                  The user randomly gains or loses some gold.
‚óÜ„Äã | +editmypfp               Edits your profile picture.
‚óÜ„Äã | +dice                    Rolls the dice.
‚óÜ„Äã | +8ball                   Ask a question about the future.
‚óÜ„Äã | +funfact                 Random funfact.
```
